title: forming 5's team need 1 more person around silver elo
body:
need 1 more, send friend request to
summer name Azuriell or Azuriell nidaime

replies.body:
Hey Im Silver 5 atm (almost s4) I can pretty much play anywhere but dont really like adc/top.
I would consider myself a mid main so if your postion is still open add my account: CELLFAM
I am mid main, add my account, Campbelltron.
support/adc role is heavily contested, would like to have a jungle or mid that can sub yet play games fairly often (more members more games)
position still open as we will want to have subs, flexible on which rolls you would like, also have personal teamspeak channel
